com.krobothsoftware.snc.sen.psn

Class PlaystationNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.snc.NetworkClient
      • com.krobothsoftware.snc.sen.SonyEntertainmentNetwork
        • com.krobothsoftware.snc.sen.psn.PlaystationNetwork

  • public class PlaystationNetwork
extends SonyEntertainmentNetwork
    Sony's PlayStationNetwork client for getting games, trophies, and friends. There are three types of methods.
    • Token - Data retrieved by login Token: Friends, Games, and Trophies.
    • Public - Publically data without any login token. Uses US site for public games and trophies.
    • Official - Methods that are internally used in platforms and not public to get data.

    Call login(String, String, ProgressListener) to obtain a login token.

    Since:
    SEN-PSN 1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaystationNetwork

        public PlaystationNetwork()
        Creates new PlayStationNetwork client.
        • Creates TICKET and PSNTICKET cookies for public methods
        • Sets up Authentications: c7y-basic01, and c7y-trophy01 for official methods
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0
        See Also:
        setPsnTicketId(String)

    • Method Detail

      • setPsnTicketId

        public static void setPsnTicketId(String id)
        Sets PsnId for TICKET and PSNTICKET cookies. Will only take effect once new client is initiated. Default value is "*".
        Parameters:
        id - new PsnId
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • login

        public PsnToken login(String username,
             String password,
             ProgressListener listener)
               throws IOException,
                      PlaystationNetworkException,
                      ClientLoginException
        Performs a full login to UK account and quietly into US site.

        Connections made 

         https://store.playstation.com/j_acegi_external_security_check?target=/external/loginDefault.action
 https://store.playstation.com/j_acegi_external_security_check?target=/external/loginDefault.action
 https://store.playstation.com/external/loginDefault.action (;jsessionid=****) is appended at end if not set
 https://secure.eu.playstation.com/sign-in/confirmation/ (?sessionId=****)
 http://us.playstation.com/uwps/HandleIFrameRequests (?sessionId=****)
 http://searchjid.usa.np.community.playstation.net/basic_view/func/search_jid

        Data retrieved

        • Login cookies
        • Jid
        • SessionId

        Parameters:
        username - email of account
        password - password of account
        listener - monitor progress events. May be null.
        Returns:
        login token
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if username or password are null
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientLoginException - if credentials are incorrect
        PlaystationNetworkException - if service is down or login failed
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • login

        public void login(PsnToken token,
         String username,
         String password,
         ProgressListener listener)
           throws ClientLoginException,
                  IOException,
                  PlaystationNetworkException
        Performs a re-login for given token; updates token.

        Connections made 

         https://store.playstation.com/j_acegi_external_security_check?target=/external/loginDefault.action
 https://store.playstation.com/j_acegi_external_security_check?target=/external/loginDefault.action
 https://store.playstation.com/external/loginDefault.action (;jsessionid=****) is appended at end if not set
 https://secure.eu.playstation.com/sign-in/confirmation/ (?sessionId=****)

        Data retrieved

        • Updated login cookies
        • New sessionId

        Parameters:
        token - login token to log into again
        username - email of account
        password - password of account
        listener - monitor progress events. May be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if username or password are null
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientLoginException - if credentials are incorrect
        PlaystationNetworkException - if service is down or login failed
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • logout

        public void logout(PsnToken token)
            throws IOException
        Logs out of account(token). Clearing cookies in token and and setting SessionId to null is an alternative.

        Connections made 

         https://secure.eu.playstation.com/logout/

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • isServiceOnline

        public boolean isServiceOnline()
                        throws IOException
        Checks if psn service is online.

        Connections made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/sign-in/

        Returns:
        true, if psn is online
        Throws:
        IOException
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getFriendList

        public List<PsnFriend> getFriendList(PsnToken token)
                              throws IOException,
                                     TokenException,
                                     ClientException,
                                     PlaystationNetworkException
        Retrieves token friend list.

        Connections made 

         https://secure.eu.playstation.com/ajax/mypsn/friend/presence/

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        Returns:
        list of friends or empty if account has none
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        TokenException - if token has expired or invalid
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        PlaystationNetworkException - if psn is not available
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getFriendGameList

        public List<PsnGame> getFriendGameList(PsnToken token,
                              String friendPsnId)
                                throws IOException,
                                       TokenException,
                                       ClientException,
                                       PlaystationNetworkException
        Retrieves token friend's game list.

        Connections made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies-compare/?friend= (friend psnId) &mode=FRIENDS

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        friendPsnId - friend psn id
        Returns:
        list of friend's game list or empty if friend has none
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        TokenException - if token has expired or invalid
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        PlaystationNetworkException - if friend psnId is invalid or psn is not available
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getFriendTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophy> getFriendTrophyList(PsnToken token,
                                  String friendPsnId,
                                  String titleLinkId)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           TokenException,
                                           ClientException,
                                           PlaystationNetworkException
        Retrieves token friend's trophy list.

        Connections made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies-compare/detail/?title= (trophy linkId) &friend= (friend psnId) &sortBy=game

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        friendPsnId - friend psn id
        titleLinkId - UK title link id
        Returns:
        list of friend's trophy list
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        TokenException - if token has expired or invalid
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        PlaystationNetworkException - if friend psnId or trophy link Id is invalid, or psn is not available
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

        public List<PsnGame> getGameList(PsnToken token)
                          throws IOException,
                                 TokenException,
                                 ClientException,
                                 PlaystationNetworkException
        Retrieves token game list.

        Connections made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies/

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        Returns:
        list of games or empty if account has none
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        TokenException - if token has expired or invalid
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        PlaystationNetworkException - if psn is not available
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophy> getTrophyList(PsnToken token,
                            String titleLinkId)
                              throws ClientException,
                                     IOException,
                                     TokenException,
                                     PlaystationNetworkException
        Retrieves token trophy list.

        Connections made 

         http://uk.playstation.com/psn/mypsn/trophies/detail/?title= (trophy link Id)

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        titleLinkId - UK title link Id
        Returns:
        list of trophies
        Throws:
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        TokenException - if token has expired or invalid
        PlaystationNetworkException - if trophy link id is invalid or psn is not available

      • getPublicGameList

        public List<PsnGame> getPublicGameList(String psnId)
                                throws IOException,
                                       ClientException
        Retrieve the public game list from US site. If account doesn't exist, an empty list will still be returned.

        May not get all given games for psnId.

        Connections made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/ (psnId) /get_ordered_trophies_data

        Platform will Platform.UNKNOWN because there is no way to tell.

        Parameters:
        psnId - psn id
        Returns:
        list of games or empty if account has none
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getPublicTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophy> getPublicTrophyList(String psnId,
                                  String titleLinkId,
                                  String gameId)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           ClientException
        Retrieve public trophy list. If is null, it will be set only if there is a earned trophy. Needs to extract Id from image.

        Connections made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/ (psnId) /get_ordered_title_details_data

        WARNING: With new US site, trophy date earned will always be null because there isn't a way to retrieve it. The description may an ellipsis(...) at the end if it is large.

        Parameters:
        psnId - psn id
        titleLinkId - US trophy link id
        gameId - Optional Official game Id. Will not affect request.
        Returns:
        list of trophies or empty list if user has none. Will return an empty list if title link Id is invalid.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error or US login cookies invalid
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getOfficialJid

        public String getOfficialJid(String psnId)
                      throws IOException
        Retrieves Jid for giving PsnId. Every psnId should be on the US server no matter what country.

        Connections made 

         http://searchjid.usa.np.community.playstation.net/basic_view/func/search_jid

        Parameters:
        psnId - psn id
        Returns:
        jid or null if not found
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getOfficialFirmwareVersion

        public String getOfficialFirmwareVersion(Platform platform)
                                  throws IOException
        Retrieves official firmware version of platform type.

        Connections made 

         (PS3) http://fus01.ps3.update.playstation.net/update/ps3/list/us/ps3-updatelist.txt
 (VITA) http://fus01.psp2.update.playstation.net/update/psp2/list/us/psp2-updatelist.xml
 (PSP) http://fu01.psp.update.playstation.org/update/psp/list2/us/psp-updatelist.txt

        Parameters:
        platform - platform to check firmware
        Returns:
        firmware version of platform
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        IllegalArgumentException - if platform is invalid, UNKNOWN
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getOfficialProfile

        public PsnProfile getOfficialProfile(String jid)
                              throws IOException,
                                     ClientException
        Retrieves official profile. Will not check if valid Jid.

        Connections made 

         http://getprof.us.np.community.playstation.net/basic_view/func/get_profile
 http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_user_info

        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        Returns:
        profile, null if not found
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error or US login cookies invalid
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.isValidJid(String)

      • getOfficialGameList

        public List<PsnGameOfficial> getOfficialGameList(String jid,
                                        int start,
                                        int max,
                                        Platform... platforms)
                                          throws IOException,
                                                 ClientException,
                                                 PlaystationNetworkException
        Retrieves game list for Jid. Good to do increments of 64 for min and max arguments. If no platform is given, PS3 will be used as default.

        Connections made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_title_list

        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        start - start index. Must be one or greater.
        max - max games
        platforms - platforms for games
        Returns:
        official game list, empty if account has none
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if start index is zero or less
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error or US login cookies invalid
        PlaystationNetworkException - if jid is invalid
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getOfficialTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyOfficial> getOfficialTrophyList(String jid,
                                            String gameId)
                                              throws IOException,
                                                     PlaystationNetworkException,
                                                     ClientException
        Retrieves official trophy list from jid and Official game Id.

        Connections made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_trophies

        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        gameId - Official game id
        Returns:
        official trophy list or empty if none found for gameId
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if game id isn't in Official format
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error or US login cookies invalid
        PlaystationNetworkException - if jid is invalid
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getOfficialLatestTrophyList

        public List<PsnTrophyOfficial> getOfficialLatestTrophyList(String jid,
                                                  int max,
                                                  Platform... platforms)
                                                    throws PlaystationNetworkException,
                                                           IOException,
                                                           ClientException
        Retrieves official latest trophy list. Good to do increments of 64 for max argument. If no platform is given, PS3 will be used as default.

        Connections made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_latest_trophies

        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        max - max amount of trophies
        platforms - platforms for trophies
        Returns:
        official trophy list
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlaystationNetworkException - if jid is invalid
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0

      • getOfficialTrophyListSince

        public List<PsnTrophyOfficial> getOfficialTrophyListSince(String jid,
                                                 int max,
                                                 String since,
                                                 Platform... platforms)
                                                   throws IOException,
                                                          PlaystationNetworkException,
                                                          ClientException
        Retrieves official trophy list from date. Good to do increments of 64 for max argument. If no platform is given, PS3 will be used as default.

        Connections made 

         http://trophy.ww.np.community.playstation.net/trophy/func/get_latest_trophies

        Parameters:
        jid - jid
        max - max amount of trophies
        since - date in format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ
        platforms - platforms for trophies
        Returns:
        official trophy list since
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        PlaystationNetworkException - if jid is invalid
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        Since:
        SEN-PSN 1.0
        See Also:
        PsnUtils.getOfficialDateFormat(java.util.Date)
